courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Restricted to first-year freshman and transfer students.
description: Grand Challenge Learning course in Inequality & Cultural Understanding provides an interdisciplinary introduction to questions related to societal inequality. Each section emphasizes experiential learning through, for example, field trips or hands-on, community-based research projects. Prerequisite: Restricted to first-year freshman and transfer students.
label: Stereotypes, Prejudice & Discrimination
sectionCappArea: Restricted to First Time Freshman or Transfer student - first time students.
sectionDegreeAttributes: Behavioral Sciences, and Grand Challenge-Inequality course.
